item-sheath-*-pistolsabre: Pistol and sabre sheaths with ammo pouch
itemdesc-quiver-*-javelin: Can hold javelins. Press 'R' to select javelin from quiver.
itemdesc-pouch-*-sling: Can hold sling bullets and sling. Press 'R' to select sling from pouch.
itemdesc-pouch-*-bullet: Can hold firearms ammunition and equipment.
itemdesc-saydak-*: Can hold arrows and bow. Press 'R' to select bow from case.
itemdesc-sheath-*-blackguardsword: Can store black guard sword. Press 'R' to select sword from sheath.
itemdesc-sheath-*-forlornsword: Can store forlorn sword. Press 'R' to select sword from sheath.
itemdesc-sheath-*-pistol: Can store pistol and firearms ammunition and equipment. Press 'R' to select pistol from sheath.
itemdesc-sheath-*-pistolsabre: Can store pistol and sabre, and firearms ammunition and equipment. Press 'R' to select pistol and sabre from sheaths.
itemdesc-sheath-*-general: Can store one-handed swords and maces. Press 'R' to select weapom from sheath or put it back.
